CONDUENT
Located in Lodz, Conduent is excited to be launching a Customer Engagement Centre to support a world famous Global automotive brand specialising in EV Mobility.
Our client is the first Car Enterprise to switch to 100% Electric and aims to transform into a leading player in urban premium electric and connected mobility and aiming to introduce an innovative business model, that is customer-centric, data-driven, direct-to-customer & will have an agent-based sales model
The role in our organisation
Conduent is hiring a dedicated Social Media Community Management Team to provide support within this multilingual Customer Engagement Centre. Based in our newly renovated office space in Lodz, you will receive full professional training on the skills, knowledge and brand awareness for this position. We are seeking Associates to work in English and/or German language specifically.
The Customer Engagement Centre operates on a shift rotation between 10:00 and 22:00 Monday to Sunday and for 40 hours per week.
If you are passionate about social media and customer engagement and are interested to spend your working day interacting with customers about this premium international automotive brand, we would love to hear from you soon!
Key Components to Success
Within the Customer Engagement Centre you will embrace Conduent’s Core Values, using these to excel in your work and exceed our clients’ expectations.
The Conduent Core Values guide how we think, act and make decisions.
• Drive Client Success
• Deliver with Quality and personal accountability
• Be open and Inclusive
• Communicate with Purpose
• Be a good teammate
• Be Conduent Proud and act with humility
Culture
Located in the third biggest city in Poland our Associates in Lodz support customers in 20 different countries in 14 different languages. Lodz is a cosmopolitan city with universities, museums and a growing arts sector. Lodz has developed into a hub for many global businesses, proving itself to be a fantastic location for talented employees. Our Associates provide integral services to our clients within Finance, Accountancy and Procurement, Customer Experience, Mailroom and Scanning, Human Resources and Service Desk.
We are proud of more than 200 highly qualified workforce, most Associates have a university degree and are bilingual. Constantly investing in our workforce Associates have access to extensive learning platforms, we offer a career opportunity to those seeking to develop and consistently seek to ensure Conduent is the employer of choice in Lodz.

NAWBUD s.c. jest dynamicznie rozwijającą się firmą w branży budowlanej, działającą na terenie całego kraju. Specjalizujemy się w innowacyjnych, niezawodnych technologiach i rozwiązaniach dla budownictwa.

Bazując na wieloletnim doświadczeniu oraz aktualnej wiedzy na temat najnowszych technologii oferujemy Państwu swoje wsparcie i pomoc w całym procesie realizacji zamówienia.

duties: Explore a variety of data from structured to unstructured data spanning client, operational and financial domains to identify opportunities for data science that add value to the business.
Advance the use of machine learning within IG by building our next generation data products, e.g. recommendation systems, chatbots, text analytics systems and automatic insight generation systems.
Work with stakeholders from across the business to turn business problems into data science solutions.
Build descriptive and predictive models to understand customer behavior and prescribe next best actions.
Build customer segmentation models to deepen understanding of our increasingly diverse client base and provide personalised customer experience.
Build predictive models to optimize IG’s pricing and hedging strategies.
Be a subject matter expert on advanced data science techniques, coaching less-experienced team members on practical approaches to applying machine learning in a commercial environment.
requirements: You have a methodical approach to solving difficult problems and will feel comfortable in presenting insights generated from data to the business using visualisation tools such as Tableau.
You have experience and the desire to coach members of the data science team on best practices
You possess excellent communication skills, explaining complicated concepts to non-technical colleagues
You are an innovative thinker keen to put forward own ideas and suggestions.
Implementing machine learning in production using in-house or third-party data science platforms
Building machine learning models; experience in Natural Language Processing, Time-Series prediction, Neural Networks and Recommendation Systems will be advantageous.
Generating insights from complex data sources.
Coaching data scientists.
Data analysis and modelling
Machine Learning: NLP, Time-Series prediction, Neural Networks, Recommendation Systems and the classic machine learning techniques
Python
SQL
Tableau or similar data visualisation tools
Big-data technology stack, e.g. Hadoop, Spark, AWS
Essential – Degree level education in numerate discipline (computer science, engineering, physics, maths, economics)
Desirable – Higher level degree (MSc/PhD) in a numerate discipline
You’re upbeat and enthusiastic, and you have an open mind and a curious, can-do attitude.

You, like us, understand the importance of collaboration and are driven to be the best in what you do. You embody our three core values – to champion the client, learn fast together and raise the bar.

You want to be part of a proudly carbon-neutral company that will prioritise your wellbeing and that of the world around you, helping to create a brighter future for all. A company that embraces diversity and welcomes everyone with respect, regardless of race, age, sexual orientation, gender, identification, faith or culture.
If you’re inspired by our way of working and can bring something new to our team of top-notch people, then you’ll find a home here.

https://www.pracuj.pl/praca/stazysta-adm.about_us:
ZF Group
ZF jest globalnym koncernem technologicznym, który dostarcza rozwiązania dla samochodów osobowych, komercyjnych oraz dla przemysłu, wspierając w ten sposób rozwój mobilności nowej generacji. Technologia ZF umożliwia pojazdom widzenie, myślenie i działanie („see. think.act”). W czterech obszarach technologicznych, takich jak sterowanie ruchem pojazdów, zintegrowane bezpieczeństwo, zautomatyzowana jazda oraz elektromobilność, firma ZF oferuje kompleksowe rozwiązania dla producentów pojazdów oraz dostawców usług transportowych. Firma ZF oferuje technologię elektromobilności dla różnych rodzajów pojazdów. Dzięki swoim produktom, firma przyczynia się do redukcji emisji zanieczyszczeń i ochrony klimatu.

duties: Independent implementation of project tasks, responsibility for the review and approval process of own studies.

requirements: Proven knowledge of power conversion equipment.
At least two year experience in field of power electronic engineering especially power conversion equipment and applications.
Understanding of power supply applications: transformer-rectifiers group, DC switchgears and substation protection, power converter topologies and control schemes, semiconductors applications.
Proven knowledge of modeling control systems and control of power electronic converters for AC/DC and DC DC conversion systems using PWM methods.
Practical knowledge of equipment and system design process and tools.
Knowledge of simulation tools such as (or similar to) MATLAB/Simulink, PLECS, SPICE and design tools such as EPLAN, Altium Designer, etc. will be an advantage.
PhD or MSc degree In Power Electronics or Electrical Engineering or related.
Good communication and collaboration skills In a multi-cultural global environment.
Strong communication skills and customer-mindedness.
Excellent written and verbal! communication skills In English.
offered: An interesting job in a company promoting innovative and modern technologies.

Good working environment.

Mars Polska sp. z o.o.
Mars is a family-owned business with more than a century of history making diverse products and offering services for people and the pets people love: M&M’S®, SNICKERS®, TWIX®, MILKY WAY®, PEDIGREE®, ROYAL CANIN®, WHISKAS®, ORBIT®, SKITTLES®, UNCLE BEN'S®. Since our Associates are as different as our products are, we offer each of them an individual approach to development and want to ensure a long career.
The Mars Five Principles – Quality, Responsibility, Mutuality, Efficiency and Freedom – inspire its more than 100,000 Associates to create value for all its partners and deliver growth they are proud of every day. The world we want tomorrow starts with how we do business today.
Mars operates in more than 80 countries, in Poland for nearly 30 years. Our offices and factories are located in Warsaw, Poznań, Niepołomice near Kraków, Sochaczew and Błonie. Our sales department is active throughout the country. In addition to production and sales, Poland is also home to global shared service centers.

LENZE-TARNÓW sp. z o.o.
Jako aktywni na całym świecie specjaliści od automatyki maszyn wspieramy naszych klientów we wszystkich fazach procesu rozwoju maszyny – od początkowego pomysłu do usług posprzedażowych, od układu sterowania do wału napędowego, czy to chcą zoptymalizować istniejącą maszynę, czy też opracować nową. Dzięki kompetencjom w kwestii rozwiązań wynikającym z ponad 70-letniego doświadczenia Lenze jest silnym partnerem u boku swojego klienta.
Oddział Lenze w Tarnowie pełni strategiczną rolę w ramach grupy Lenze zaopatrując podmioty z grupy w elementy składowe napędów. Głównym przedmiotem działalności spółki jest produkcja i precyzyjna obróbka odlewów żeliwnych, aluminiowych i detali stalowych jak również montaż przekładni bazowych i elementów mechanicznych i elektromechanicznych. Lenze Tarnów powstało w 1996 roku i od tego czasu sukcesywnie rozwija portfolio produktów, jak również zwiększa swój udział w ramach grupy Lenze.

Brainly Sp. z o.o.
Brainly is the online learning platform where over 350 million students and parents go from questioning to understanding. With their smartphones, users can snap a photo to instantly solve any problem or homework question and be matched with a Brainly product such as Community Q&A, Brainly Tutor, Math Solver or Textbook Detective.
Brainly is built to provide students, parents, experts, and teachers with a collaborative platform and tools needed to succeed in any educational environment. Based in Kraków, Poland, with U.S. headquarters in New York City, Brainly apps and websites are visited by users from over 35 countries.
Backed by Prosus, Point Nine Capital, General Catalyst, Runa Capital, Learn Capital and Kulczyk Investments. Learn more about Brainly at www.brainly.com.
Brainly is the world’s largest online community, uniting students, parents and teachers in solving their academic problems and exchanging knowledge. Every month we are proud to be home for 350 million users. Besides delivering world class educational products we’re a technology company at heart. LEGS
Jesteśmy polską firmą z kapitałem zagranicznym, jednym z największych europejskich dystrybutorów przędz tekstylnych i technicznych na bazie własnego magazynu. Zajmujemy się produkcją, importem i dystrybucją przędz naturalnych i syntetycznych. Nasza siedziba znajduje się w sercu Europy.
Na początku działalności nasza oferta adresowana była głównie do rodzimych producentów, ale po wejściu Polski do Unii Europejskiej (2004) silnie rozwinęliśmy dział eksportu. Obecnie już ok. 30% obrotu firmy pochodzi z eksportu, a nasze przędze docierają do prawie wszystkich krajów Europy.

https://www.pracuj.pl/praca/working-stud.about_us:
ZF Group
ZF is a global technology company suppling systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. ZF allows vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, ZF offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. ZF electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.
In fiscal year 2020 ZF reported sales of €32.6 billion. The company employs more than 150,000 associates at approximately 270 locations in 42 countries.

INDORAMA VENTURES POLAND SP Z O O
Indorama Ventures Poland Sp. z o.o. jest częścią Grupy Indorama, jednego z największych zintegrowanych producentów poliestru na świecie oraz wiodącego producenta przędz wełnianych. Koncern jest obecny w 124 lokalizacjach w 33 krajach na całym świecie i zatrudnia około 24.000 pracowników.
Głównym przedmiotem działalności Indorama Ventures Poland Sp. z o.o. jest produkcja politereftalanu etylenu (PET). PET jest ważnym i uniwersalnym tworzywem sztucznym wykorzystywanym do produkcji szerokiego spektrum opakowań do napojów, żywności, wyrobów farmaceutycznych, jak również innych produktów konsumpcyjnych i przemysłowych. Nasz produkt uzyskał aprobatę czołowych światowych producentów napojów, kosmetyków i artykułów chemii gospodarstwa domowego. Najobszerniejszą grupą produktów dostępnych z PET są butelki do napojów. Konsumenci mają kontakt z naszą marką na co dzień - jedna na półtorej butelki w Polsce pochodzi z włocławskiego PETu - i właśnie dlatego Jesteśmy bliżej niż myślisz.
Wizja, która przyświeca nam na co dzień to: „Być zrównoważoną firmą chemiczną światowej klasy, tworzącą znakomite produkty dla społeczeństwa”.
Wdrożyliśmy i stosujemy Zintegrowany System Zarządzania, zgodny z wymaganiami normy ISO normy ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 14064-1, OHSAS 18001, ISO 22000, ISO 50001, EMAS, SA 8000, ISO 26000 oraz SMETA.
W 2020 roku zdobyliśmy pierwsze miejsce (zarówno na szczeblu wojewódzkim, jak i ogólnopolskim) w konkursie Państwowej Inspekcji Pracy „Pracodawca – Organizator Pracy Bezpiecznej”.

duties: The Lean Transformation Leader is responsible for developing, in conjunction with functional and plant leaders, roadmap to achieve excellence in targeted KPI’s, select critical projects to whose he/she contributes with a pool of experts.

Leads Hoshin Kanri sessions, with various levels of the organization, leads the teams in developing action plans in a cross-functional fashion, represents a key connection in the catch-ball process between different HK stakeholders.

Drives the transformation, influences the development of strategy for growth of our people and designs experiential and formal training plans for our next leaders, Expands our internal lean academy to our suppliers.
Excellent architect of lean systems based on theoretical basis; He/She knows how to translate the theory in a rightly adapted business system for Dzierżoniow operations.
Captures training needs and set up development plans so to provide the right skills’ growth within the organization.
Designs, develops, and execute training in first person as needed by the different functions.
Identifies gaps and opportunities for learning, drives learning step change including benchmarking.
Uses high level of judgment to make decisions and handle complex tasks or problems in areas of operational, product management, manufacturing, technology, or engineering.
The Lean Transformation Leader interprets internal and external business challenges, leads the lean transformation inside the operations and leverage on best practices to improve our processes.

Exemplar change agent must lead innovation in both standard of work and habits of the organization, using strong interpersonal skills, ability to interpret people’s needs, context and needs of change.

The Lean Transformation Leader identifies opportunities for lean projects, defines a lean roadmap along with the functional leaders and develops key competences within the organization, brings new competences, training in first person key stakeholders at various level of the organization.

This role requires a master ability in: Bowling chart deployment and KPI roll out; Problem solving tools; Daily management system; Coaching framework and more precisely coaching capability within the organization; Lean basic tools; Data analysis and problem-solving tools at its widest range.
Reports on Lean performance, progress and key performance indicators to the Site Leader and Lean Value Stream Manager.
Leads Lean Audits within the business and participate on external parties Audit/Control as required.
Participates in regular corporate meetings and teleconferences, reporting the current state of KPIs, sharing good practices.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in an industrial or manufacturing environment, working in a global company.
Relevant professional education.
Advanced practical computer skills primally with MS Office: writing procedures & manuals, preparing presentations, analyses & reports.
Proven ability to develop sustainable cooperative professional relationships on all levels of the organization.
Leadership skills and hands on & proactive approach.
Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.
Proven ability to prioritize, focus on and obtain business results.
Good Polish & English oral and written communication skills.
offered: Employment contract in a stable company.
Dynamic, innovative international working place with excellent opportunities for growth and development.
Good working atmosphere in the organizational culture promoting Diversity & Inclusion.
Attractive social benefits package: Private medical care Medicover, additional insurance, retirement program (PPE), Social Fund (ZFŚS), bonus system and others.
Professional working tools and multi-tasking working time.

https://www.pracuj.pl/praca/specjalista-.about_us:
ZF Group
ZF jest globalnym koncernem technologicznym, który dostarcza rozwiązania dla samochodów osobowych, komercyjnych oraz dla przemysłu, wspierając w ten sposób rozwój mobilności nowej generacji. Technologia ZF umożliwia pojazdom widzenie, myślenie i działanie („see. think.act”). W czterech obszarach technologicznych, takich jak sterowanie ruchem pojazdów, zintegrowane bezpieczeństwo, zautomatyzowana jazda oraz elektromobilność, firma ZF oferuje kompleksowe rozwiązania dla producentów pojazdów oraz dostawców usług transportowych. Firma ZF oferuje technologię elektromobilności dla różnych rodzajów pojazdów. Dzięki swoim produktom, firma przyczynia się do redukcji emisji zanieczyszczeń i ochrony klimatu.

Exorigo-Upos S.A.
Exorigo-Upos S.A. wraz Finture i Finture AI tworzy stabilną, polską grupą informatyczną o międzynarodowym zasięgu. Posiadamy własne oddziały m.in. w Rumunii, Wielkiej Brytanii, Czechach, Słowacji, Ukrainie.
To zespół ponad 1000 ekspertów m.in. inżynierów, developerów, project managerów, architektów i analityków IT oraz pracowników serwisu. Nasza działalność koncentruje się od 20 lat na wsparciu branży retail.

Zapewniamy również kompleksowe usługi IT dla branży logistycznej, bankowej, ubezpieczeniowej, finansowej, motoryzacyjnej i paliwowo-energetycznej.

LEGS
Jesteśmy polską firmą z kapitałem zagranicznym, jednym z największych europejskich dystrybutorów przędz tekstylnych i technicznych na bazie własnego magazynu. Zajmujemy się produkcją, importem i dystrybucją przędz naturalnych i syntetycznych. Nasza siedziba znajduje się w sercu Europy.
Na początku działalności nasza oferta adresowana była głównie do rodzimych producentów, ale po wejściu Polski do Unii Europejskiej (2004) silnie rozwinęliśmy dział eksportu. Obecnie już ok. 30% obrotu firmy pochodzi z eksportu, a nasze przędze docierają do prawie wszystkich krajów Europy.

Hitachi Energy Services Sp. z o.o.
At Hitachi Energy our purpose is advancing a sustainable energy future for all. We bring power to our homes, schools, hospitals and factories. Join us and work with fantastic people, while learning and developing yourself on projects that have a real impact to our communities and society. Bring your passion, bring your energy, and be part of a global team that appreciates a simple truth: Diversity + Collaboration = Great Innovation
Hitachi Energy is a global technology leader that is advancing a sustainable energy future for all. We serve customers in the utility, industry and infrastructure sectors with innovative solutions and services across the value chain. Together with customers and partners, we pioneer technologies and enable the digital transformation required to accelerate the energy transition towards a carbon-neutral future. We are advancing the world’s energy system to become more sustainable, flexible and secure whilst balancing social, environmental and economic value. Hitachi Energy has a proven track record and unparalleled installed base in more than 140 countries. Headquartered in Switzerland, we employ around 38,000 people in 90 countries and generate business volumes of approximately $10 billion USD. www.hitachienergy.com

ZF Group
ZF is a global technology company suppling systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. RTB House is a global company that provides state-of-the-art marketing technologies for top brands and agencies worldwide. Its proprietary ad buying engine is the first in the world to be powered entirely by Deep Learning algorithms, enabling advertisers to generate outstanding results and reach their goals at every stage of the funnel.

RSM Poland
RSM Poland jest członkiem RSM, wiodącej sieci niezależnych firm doradczych i audytorskich, która posiada 820 biur w 120 krajach i zatrudnia więcej niż 48.000 specjalistów na świecie.
RSM Poland to profesjonalni doradcy i zaufani partnerzy w biznesie. Zdajemy sobie sprawę, że naszym największym kapitałem są ludzie i dokładamy wszelkich starań, aby kwalifikacje każdego członka naszego zespołu były na jak najwyższym poziomie i podlegały ciągłemu doskonaleniu.

DEMO Effective Launching
Czy potrafisz na rynku wytropić to czego na pozór nie widać?
Wykryć tendencje i procesy? Uchwycić korelacje między kategoriami i zachowaniami konsumentów, tak aby znaleźć potencjał na rozwój produktów i marek?
Jeśli to Twoja pasja i nie brakuje Ci entuzjazmu - zapraszamy!
Od 30 lat zajmujemy się launchingiem i relaunchingiem marek.
Skutecznie pomagamy naszym Klientom na każdym etapie tego procesu.
Szukamy potencjału wzrostu produktów i marek. Tworzymy strategie marek, koncepcje nowych produktów, strategie komunikacji oraz realizujemy kreację i produkcję do kampanii reklamowych w mediach tradycyjnych i digitalowych. Najważniejsza dla nas jest skuteczność podejmowanych działań, a wyróżnia nas to, że "pod jednym dachem" łączymy mocne kompetencje strategiczne, kreatywne i mediowe.
Więcej o nas dowiesz się na www.demo.com.pl

duties: Mapowanie i modelowanie procesu zakupowego i ścieżki użytkownika - dzięki Tobie internauci będą szli do finalizacji transakcji jak po sznurku.
Prowadzenie badań UX - nasze szklane kule zostawiamy w domach, a w pracy kierujemy się sprawdzonymi danymi zamiast przeczuciami (Google Analytics, Smartlook, Hotjar, Cux).
Testy stron i rozwiązań UX - nie poprzestajemy na “u mnie działa”, dążymy do tego, żeby działało u wszystkich (Google Optimize).
Przygotowywanie rekomendacji w zakresie optymalizacji konwersji oraz wskazywanie obszarów UX/UI do poprawy na stronach www - żeby wszystkim użytkownikom strony żyło się lepiej!
Prowadzenie warsztatów i szkoleń dla klientów Verseo - lubimy dzielić się swoją wiedzą.
Tworzenie atrakcyjnych wizualnie i z dobrym UX prezentacji i raportów z wnioskami z analiz - będziesz w przystępny sposób tłumaczyć innym, co można zrobić lepiej.
requirements: Masz doświadczenie z zaawansowaną analityką e-commerce i znasz zasady AI, UX, UI - bez wymogu projektowania graficznego.
Wiesz, jak modelować lejki sprzedaży i ścieżki przepływu użytkowników.
Potrafisz zadbać o to, aby projekty dla klientów cechowała najwyższa jakość i dbałość o każdy szczegół, tworzysz estetyczne raporty i wizualizacje danych.
Znasz Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Tag Manager, Google Optimize, Google Data Studio minimum na poziomie bardzo dobrym.

Arcadis jest wiodącą, globalną firmą projektowo-doradczą dla środowiska naturalnego i obiektów budowlanych. duties: People management - you will be the person who ensures individuals know what is expected of them, where they fulfil the expectations and what are the things they could improve. You will ensure the individuals have a good environment around them and have everything they need in order to do their job.

People development - you will be the person who helps individuals in finding the right path to be better at what they do. You will do that by systematic contact, gathering information from individuals, coaching and supporting them in setting their own goals. Later you will support them in order to organize what they need to achieve those goals and be in line with the company’s needs.
Team coaching - You will cooperate with one or more teams and you will be coaching them so they can improve their agile processes and become stronger, better organized and more efficient.

Organization changing - we never stop moving. We’re an agile organization and we adjust to the changing world. You will be able to help us by shaping common processes, suggesting and doing improvements in many areas of the Engineering department and the whole organization.
requirements: You are a leader, meant to inspire and to lead by example. Line Manager is expected to have a positive attitude and to be focused on solutions, turn negativity into positive thinking and make sure that the best possible product is built.
We think you are a thorough, accountable, efficient person who is excited to make use of the latest tech trends to improve what we do.
Since we are a multicultural team English is the required language.

Ability to manage projects from start to finish

duties: Developing & implementing the operational vendor management (OVM) framework and processes working closely with the Infrastructure Product Groups, Regional Delivery Leads, Service Integration Department, and IT Controlling [Finance], Sourcing & Strategic Alliances.

Driving internal PG partner compliance with OVM framework; continuously advising and engaging with partners and colleagues involved in vendor relationships and acting as an advisor. Stakeholder Satisfaction Management: measuring, managing and reporting on partner satisfaction related to each vendor relationship.

Driving the continuous improvement activities by means of root cause analysis and pattern analysis of key vendor issues; collaboration with cross-functional internal and external functions to aid the design and implementation of OVM enhancements over time.
Enabling continuous monitoring of vendor performance against contractual service level agreements through creation of vendor performance dashboards, scorecards and/or reports.
Alignment with Strategic Alliance & IT Sourcing to ensure vendor performance and strategic direction is aligned to respective category sourcing strategies.

Executing, for assigned tasks, all actions in IT processes according to agreed RACI’s. Ensuring teams adhere to IT process framework and governance model. Acting as escalation point and resolving disputes arising in relation to IT OVM framework
Developing and improving the efficiency and transparency of the vendor finance and invoicing processes for all relevant parties.

Regularly evaluating the market for new technologies that can be used to assist, improve, and automate Support activities; Developing and implementing effective service policies and procedures including analysis, recommendation, and rollout of new Services
Building and providing inspired leadership for the organization; motivating and energizing the team of internal and external operational experts.
requirements: Master/Bachelor’s degree in any discipline or 5+ years of experience in IT Vendor Management or Service Delivery Operations.
Min. 3 years of experience in IT vendor management including past exposure to operations management and outsourcing suppliers.
Proven experience in the implementation of successful corporate level end user support programs; strong ownership and leadership demonstrated with a success track over previous assignments.
Strong reactive and proactive mindset to establish sense-of-urgency to remediate and at the same time identify and eradicate root-causes of service deterioration.
Extensive people and remote team management experience required.
Experience with managing vendors; IT supplier selection, contract negotiation and RFP process.
Good knowledge of ITSM tools (ServiceNow), MS Office Products, ITIL, Lean Six Sigma.
Excellent business writing and presentation skills in English.

https://www.pracuj.pl/praca/financial-mo.about_us:
LSEG (London Stock Exchange Group)
LSEG
LSEG (London Stock Exchange Group) is more than a diversified global financial markets infrastructure and data business. We are dedicated, open-access partners with a commitment to excellence in delivering the services our customers expect from us. With extensive experience, deep knowledge and worldwide presence across financial markets, we enable businesses and economies around the world to fund innovation, manage risk and create jobs. It’s how we’ve contributed to supporting the financial stability and growth of communities and economies globally for more than 300 years.
Data & Analytics
Our acquisition of Refinitiv means we can provide the breadth and depth of financial data and best-in-class analytics that customers expect –driving innovation and growth across global markets. And our high-performance solutions –from trading, to market surveillance, to wealth solutions and more–help to enhance the performance of our customers.
FTSE Russell is a leading global provider of financial indexing, benchmarking and analytic services with more than $16 trillion benchmarked to our indices –and offers an extensive range of data services and research.
The combination of Refinitiv and FTSE Russell provides LSEG with leading capabilities in data, analytics, indices and benchmarks
Capital Markets
We offer our customers extensive access to capital markets and liquidity across multiple asset classes. We operate a broad range of international equity, fixed income, exchange-traded funds/exchange-traded products and foreign exchange markets. Our Group is home to several capital formation and execution venues: London Stock Exchange, AIM, Turquoise, CurveGlobal, FXall and Tradeweb (through a majority ownership interest).
Post Trade
We support our customers’ clearing and reporting obligations, providing risk, balance sheet and financial resource management solutions, whilst working with our other divisions to extend this support across the value chain.
A leading global clearing house with a strong presence across multiple asset classes, LCH helps financial institutions all over the world use their capital efficiently and manage counterparty risk. We work closely with sell-side clearing members and buy-side clients in conjunction with trading venues globally. UnaVista, a regulated platform that helps customers meet their reporting compliance obligations and reduce operational and regulatory risk through reporting, reference data and analytics solutions, further complements our Post Trade offering.
Through a comprehensive suite of trusted financial market infrastructure services –and our open-access model –we provide the flexibility, stability and trust that enable our customers to pursue their ambitions with confidence and clarity.
LSEG is headquartered in the United Kingdom, with significant operations in 70 countries across EMEA, North America, Latin America and Asia Pacific. We employ 25,000 people globally, more than half located in Asia Pacific.

duties: Performing assigned activities in the service catalog management, change implementation management, release and deployment management, incident and major incident management, event management, service level management, problem management processes to ensure IT Service delivery.

requirements: Experience in network infrastructure operations.
Mandatory: Certification related to networking topics (CCNA); Knowledge in Checkpoint, Firewall, Riverbed, Optimization services (WAAS) equipment.
Desirable: ITIL Foundation Version 3 or 4; Advanced certifications about CISCO (CCNP, CCIE); Project Management experience (Certification by PMI, PRINCE2 being a plus).

Experience with: WAN (SDWAN, QoS, Routing protocols e.g. EIGRP, OSPF, BGP4); LAN (SD Access, Switching e.g. STP, VTP); WLAN (Wireless LAN), WAN Optimization; Firewalls (ASA, Checkpoint); AAA (ACS, ISE); Network management and monitoring systems; strong hands-on experience with Cisco Network Hardware (firewalls, switches, routers).
Working knowledge to troubleshoot the functions of firewall Packet Flow, Captures, NAT, Routing, ACLs.
Understanding of network security, vulnerabilities and countermeasures.
Good command of English and cultural awareness to be able to work in a complex, multicultural and global team.
A collaborative, solutions- and customer-service-oriented approach and strong communication skills.

TUZ Towarzystwo Ubezpieczeń Wzajemnych
Dobra praca? Jest TUZ, tuż. W takiej firmie jeszcze nie pracowałeś. Bo drugiej takiej nie ma. Żadna inna firma w historii ubezpieczeń w Polsce nie zmieniła się tak bardzo i tak korzystnie jak TUZ. Efekty? Rynek ubezpieczeń zmalał, a TUZ urósł. Do tego dostał nagrodę z KNF za mediacje, czyli szczególnie przychylne traktowanie Klientów. „Bądź uczciwy jak TUZ” – to tytuł z „Gazety Ubezpieczeniowej” i nasze motto. Nasze, czyli firmy, której prezes został uznany Menedżerem Roku 2019. „O TUZ to się mówi” – zauważa prasa. A teraz poszukaj drugiej takiej firmy albo zgłoś się do nas, oTUZ to!

CAVATINA Holding S.A. jest największym polskim deweloperem powierzchni biurowych. Nasze projekty wyróżniają się unikalną architekturą, nagradzaną w polskich i międzynarodowych konkursach. Do aktualnej pozycji na rynku doprowadziły nas lata zaangażowanej pracy ludzi, którzy tworzą tą firmę. Nasz zespół stanowi dzisiaj ponad 264 ekspertów z różnych dziedzin. niebojących się innowacyjnych wyzwań. Dlatego poszukujemy ludzi, którzy podobnie jak my, potrafią myśleć poza utartym schematem i chcą sięgać dalej.

Westwing.pl
Misją Westwing jest inspirowanie i sprawianie, by każdy dom był pięknym domem. Naszym celem jest dostarczenie cudów e-handlu dla domu i mieszkania do ponad 1,5 miliona aktywnych klientów w 11 krajach. W ciągu zaledwie 10 lat działalności na rynku, osiągnęliśmy ponad 433 miliony euro rocznego przychodu. Co ważniejsze, możliwości, jakie stoją przed nami są ogromne.
Zespół Westwing to sekret naszego sukcesu. Ponad 1700 członków naszego zespołu łączy kreatywność i styl z innowacyjną technologią i solidnymi podstawami biznesowymi. Jesteśmy dumni, że możemy pracować z inspirującymi kolegami, którzy są inteligentni, zabawni, ambitni i szukają wyzwania, aby przekształcić branżę i przenieść ją w przyszłość.

For almost 30 years in the telecom and technology industry, we have successfully delivered over 1000 complex, high-stake projects to more than 100 operators worldwide, supporting them throughout the 2G to 5G evolution.
As we progress into the digital transformation era, we aim to become the tech partner of choice for global organizations looking to innovate and expand their business through the latest technology.
• 2,700 employees worldwide

• 16 delivery hubs, including centers of excellence in Romania, Poland, Moldova
